column3: See line 95 in `qt/walletcontroller.cpp`\nThere it checks if the wallet is empty even though it isn't null (I think).
@promag In case you call `loadwallet` very early in `bitcoin-qt` init. @fanquake has written a python script in https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/16937 that triggers it consistently.

Sorry, forgot to update this, see #16963.\n\nNote that conceptually you are being notified about a new wallet, it should exist! Also this change hides a more severe problem which is explained in my PR.
Thanks, closing this now in favour of https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/16963.
